title: Video: Syron – Three Dreams (Feat. Horror Stories)
content:
As far as pop songs go, this new one from South London’s Syron is pretty much perfect.

Sure, it’s not going to make me re-evaluate my life; hell, I’ll be honest, I’ve listened to it half a dozen times and I probably still couldn’t tell you a third of the lyrics, but in truth, that’s pretty unnecessary. It’s no strings attached pop at it’s very best, lively, insanely addictive and goddamn enjoyable. (Premiered via Best Fit)
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
